title: S17 Ep76: The Decision To Kill: A Teenage Killer and His Fight for Salvation w/Leslie Ghiglieri
itunes:title: The Decision To Kill: A Teenage Killer and His Fight for Salvation w/Leslie Ghiglieri
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents The Decision To Kill:  A Teenage Killer and His Fight for Salvation with Author, Leslie Ghiglieri!

A 1986 family tragedy propels this gripping true crime debut as a mother searches for answers in the shocking murder of her husband—and conviction of her son. Cheri searches for answers from her son, Dwayne, as to why he could commit such a heinous act, while Dwayne tries to prove to everyone through the years that he is not the person they believed him to be the drug addicted, danger to society he was portrayed as, when he killed his father.

Get your copy of "The Decision To Kill" here: https://bit.ly/3OM9Ouh

Follow Leslie on Facebook here:  https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100075272914272
